Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.domain

Class Chap

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.domain.Chap
public class Chap extends Object
Represents the player in Larry Croft's Adventures
Author:
Anthony Kendrew (300607402)

  • Constructor Details

    • Chap

      public Chap(Board board, Free tile, int playerTreasureCount)
      Create a new Chap character. A new character should be created per level.
      Parameters:
      board - the board that Chap is placed on
      tile - the tile that the player is standing on
      playerTreasureCount - the number of treasures the player has collected so far

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(Chap.Direction direction) throws IllegalMove
      Move the character on the board one square in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to move the character
      Throws:
      IllegalMove - if the tile to the given direction is not traversable or the edge of the board is encountered

    • addItem

      public boolean addItem(Item item)
      Add an item to the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to add
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the player's inventory is full

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(Item item)
      Remove an item from the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to add
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the item was not found in the player's inventory

    • hasItem

      public boolean hasItem(Item item)
      Check if the player has an item in their inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to check
      Returns:
      true if the player has the item, false otherwise

    • canUnlockExit

      public boolean canUnlockExit()
      Check whether the player can unlock the exit lock.
      Returns:
      true if the player has collected all the treasures on the board, false otherwise

    • setState

      public void setState(Chap.State state)
      Update the state of the player
      Parameters:
      state - the new state
